Uses of Class
com.jme3.shadow.AbstractShadowRenderer

  • Packages that use AbstractShadowRenderer 
    Package Description
    com.jme3.shadow  

    • Uses of AbstractShadowRenderer in com.jme3.shadow

      Classes in com.jme3.shadow with type parameters of type AbstractShadowRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractShadowFilter<T extends AbstractShadowRenderer>
      Generic abstract filter that holds common implementations for the different shadow filtesr
      Subclasses of AbstractShadowRenderer in com.jme3.shadow 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DirectionalLightShadowRenderer
      DirectionalLightShadowRenderer renderer use Parrallel Split Shadow Mapping technique (pssm)
      It splits the view frustum in several parts and compute a shadow map for each one.
      splits are distributed so that the closer they are from the camera, the smaller they are to maximize the resolution used of the shadow map.
      This result in a better quality shadow than standard shadow mapping.
      for more informations on this read this http://http.developer.nvidia.com/GPUGems3/gpugems3_ch10.html
      class  PointLightShadowRenderer
      PointLightShadowRenderer renders shadows for a point light
      class  SpotLightShadowRenderer
      SpotLightShadowRenderer renderer use Parrallel Split Shadow Mapping technique (pssm)
      It splits the view frustum in several parts and compute a shadow map for each one.
      splits are distributed so that the closer they are from the camera, the smaller they are to maximize the resolution used of the shadow map.
      This result in a better quality shadow than standard shadow mapping.
      for more informations on this read this http://http.developer.nvidia.com/GPUGems3/gpugems3_ch10.html
      Fields in com.jme3.shadow declared as AbstractShadowRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected T AbstractShadowFilter.shadowRenderer
